Pre-Game Insights: The Rockets have one of the best defenses of the current season, allowing only 106.6 points per game on average - third place in the league in this indicator.
Houston has been winning steadily and currently sits in third place in the Western Conference with a 21-11 record.
Houston lost two in a row, first losing 112:113 to Minnesota and then 100:104 to Miami.
Forward Amen Thompson will miss the next two matches due to a mass brawl.
Dallas Mavericks have three losses in the last four games due to Luka Doncic's injury.
Doncic is expected to miss about a month, and Dallas' position may deteriorate noticeably in the very near future.
The Mavericks have a balanced record of 20-13 and sit fourth in the Western Conference.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The meeting with the Heat was accompanied by a mass brawl, the instigator of which was Amen Thompson.
Forward Amen Thompson will miss the next two matches due to a mass brawl.
The contest is considered a Texas derby.
The expert tip suggests betting on a total under, as well as on the fact that the Mavericks will not manage to break their individual total.
